dict.acceptation: 危险，冒险；保险额；被保险人或物；
冒…的危险；使…冒风险（或面临危险）；

sent.orig: When our children were young, one of our favorite board games was Risk.
sent.trans: 当我们的孩子还小时，我们最喜欢玩的游戏之一就是棋盘[战国风云](Risk)。

sent.orig: Risk includes the six elements of risk source,risk object,risk subject,risk standard,risk assessment,risk tendency.
sent.trans: 风险包含风险源、风险客体、风险主体、风险标准、风险评价、风险走向等六大要素。

sent.orig: Including risk, risk subject, risk factor, risk object, state of risk, risk event etc.
sent.trans: 包括：风险，风险主体，风险因素，风险客体，风险状况，风险事件等。

sent.orig: Unique risk may be called unsystematic risk, residual risk, specific risk, or diversifiable risk.
sent.trans: 21特定风险可以被称为非系统风险、剩余风险、特定风险或者可分散风险。
